paper.title: Founding Cryptography on Oblivious Transfer --- Efficiently

author.org: Technion, Israel and University of California, Los Angeles,

paper.abstract: We present a simple and efficient compiler for transforming secure multi-party computation (MPC) protocols that enjoy security only with an honest majority into MPC protocols that guarantee security with no honest majority, in the oblivious-transfer (OT) hybrid model.
